description: User roles (configurable in Settings): regular, advanced, and expert. Expert provides full access, while regular offers a simpler view for beginners.
Added support for Data Work Order 1.0 (DWO), allowing you to browse and manage DWO objects in the application. Shown only when the connected WITSML server supports DWO.
You can now select logs from multiple WITSML servers and display them together in a single view.
Compare two wellbores, including all sub-objects.
Copy wellbores with user-selected sub-objects between different WITSML servers.
